name: The Haggler
description:
Since you were a wee hagglet, you have always wanted to build your own human being from scrap parts. Now is the time to scratch that goal off your bucket list. Join The Haggler on an epic adventure to build your own human and interact with other weirdos along the way.

Features:

5 chapters of game play.
A Choose Your Own Adventure / Visual Novel with a bizarre setting.
2 Different Endings

Controls:

Use the mouse to click on buttons and enter or click the mouse to advance dialogue. (If the dialogue was previously automatically advancing such as on the beach and it stops, you have to advance the dialogue manually as you hit an event.)

Updates:
